answerText: Doppler effect[10] This doubly eponymous experiment used the Doppler shift to cancel gravitational blueshift, thereby providing a test of the equivalence principle of general relativity.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC San Diego and Washington University and Chicago B | 6 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A quadratic tranverse version of it is known as the Shklovskii effect,  [10] Name this effect, in which there is a shift in frequency and wavelength when there is relative movement between observer and source.
